top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
In the old days, a piece of paper in the kitchen where we can both add to the list. Now, we use Google Keep and have a shared list.
I'm the shopper in my house of 3 adults.  There is a grocery list on the counter.  If it's not on the list, I don't buy it.  No whining about not having chips!

We usually shop together. We both put things in the notes on our phone when we think of them, and then if only one person goes, the other person texts them their list so they can be combined.  
We would probably use a shared app if we weren’t too cheap to pay for one. We use one to keep track of appointments.
